modName: ebony mail and armor _ dark cape clear or with pentagram
summary:
This mod adds a nice dark cape with a pentagram to your ebony mail and the ebony armor. It\'s made for both genders!
(If you don\'t like pentagrams, no problem: in the new main file you can find also a clear version of the dark cape)
descriptionHtml:
Are you bored by your ebony mail/armor? Do you wanna have a dark cape to improve your look as a shadowhunter? Yes?

Ok, this mod is the right for you! ;)

Inspired by the mod \"Capes for Armors\" by Eferas and Phate3 (link to that mod: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5745), I wanted to give the ebony mail/armor with a \"pentagram cape\" the ultimate look.
[I have created it for male and female]

I hope you like it!

(If you have a wish or an idea for a cape-design, write me a message with your imaginations. ;D)

... if you don\'t like pentagrams, you can also download the alternativ dark cape without that symbol. ^^

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
update:

Now you can get the dark cape (for the ebony mail) also without a pentagram. For both genders! (in the downloadfile there is also the pentagram-version included) - 12.01.2012

next update - You can download both variants of the dark cape for the normal ebony armor! For male and female of course. ;) - 12.01.2012


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
installation:

Select your favorite version of the cape and copy the folders \"meshes\" and \"textures\" from your choise into your data folder (in the Skyrim Installation directory)

To deinstall, you have to delete the copied folders manually.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
credits:
Special thanks to the modders Eferas and Phate3 for your extensive \"Capes for Armors\" mod.




Best wishes,

your P.M. aka MeisterDerSchatten
author: MeisterDerSchatten
